ARABIC: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The ruling circle of Pharaoh's people said, 'This is certainly a skilled magician
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The nobles of Pharaoh said: "He surely is a clever magician.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The elders of Pharaoh's people said: 'Surely this man is a skilful magician
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Some of the Pharaoh's nobles considered him to be no more than a skillful magician
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said the chieftains of Firaun’s people, “He is really an expert magician.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The chiefs of the people of Fir`awn said: "This is indeed a well-versed sorcerer."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The chiefs of Firon's people said: most surely this is an enchanter possessed of knowledge:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said the Council of the people of Pharaoh, 'Surely this man is a cunning sorcerer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The chiefs of Pharaoh's people said: Lo! this is some knowing wizard,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The chiefs of Pharaoh's people said, "This is most surely a skillful magician,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The chiefs of the people of Fir'awn said: verily this is a magician knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The elite of Pharaoh’s people said, ‘This is indeed an expert magician;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Said the Chiefs of the people of Pharaoh: "This is indeed a sorcerer well-versed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The chiefs of the people of Fir'aun (Pharaoh) said: "This is indeed a well-versed sorcerer;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The assembly of Pharaoh's nation said: 'This man is a wellversed sorcerer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The notables among Pharaoh’s people said, “This is really a skilled magician.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Said the eminent among the people of Pharaoh, "Indeed, this is a learned magician
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:109] The council of Pharaoh’s folk said, ‘Surely this man is a cunning sorcerer, outstanding in the art of magic, in [sūrat] al-Shu‘arā’ [Q. 26:34], these are actually Pharaoh’s words, and so it is as if they said it in consultation with him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The chiefs of Pharaoh's people said: Lo! this is some knowing wizard) who is proficient in wizardry, 169
